greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Exponent of the highest power of 2 dividing number of divisors of n: a(n) = A007814(A000005(n)); 2-adic valuation of tau(n).
comment: In the prime factorization of n = p1^e1 * ... pk^ek, add together the number of trailing 1-bits in each exponent e when they are written in binary.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
Index entries for sequences computed from exponents in factorization of n
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Nov 28 2017
